publication.title: Epistemology's search for significance
publication.jconf: Journal of Experimental and Theoretical Artificial Intelligence
publication.abstract: Epistemology is supposed to guide our reason. This means that episte- mology is practically important because our beliefs so often play a decisive role in how we decide to act.
